summary: This NetWare-specific module handles Apache HTTP Server initialization, shutdown events, and resource cleanup on the NetWare platform. It registers callbacks for server shutdown and ensures proper resource cleanup when the server terminates.

logs.reason: This string is used as a resource tag for the server shutdown event notification in NetWare. It would appear in NetWare system logs when resources for the down server callback are allocated or when the event is triggered.
logs.resolution: This is an informational message indicating Apache is properly registering for shutdown events. If this resource isn't appearing when expected, check that Apache has proper permissions to register system events in NetWare.
